title: Billie on Billie Bossa Nova (Spotify Commentary)
lyrics:
[Spoken Word]
"Billie Bossa Nova" 's a little bit of a... fantasy... I don't even know what. We actually called this song "Billie Bossa Nova" because in... I wanna say like spring of 2019, my brother sent me a beat that he had made and he called it "Billie Bossa Nova" 'cause it was just a Bossa Nova type beat, and I was like "that's amazing," and then, nothing happened for like a year and a half, um... and then... we listened to it again and kind of wrote this fantasy, romanticized, glorified dream.
